title: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Undergraduate course covering fundamental concepts in machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and practical applications.

title: Advanced Natural Language Processing
description: Graduate seminar exploring cutting-edge research in NLP, including transformer architectures, language models, and evaluation methodologies.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Core computer science course covering fundamental data structures, algorithm design, and complexity analysis.

title: Research Methods in Computer Science
description: Graduate course focusing on research methodologies, experimental design, and academic writing in computer science.

title: Undergraduate Research Seminar
description: Independent research projects supervised by faculty members. Students work on cutting-edge research problems in their area of interest.
